description: Education Minister Lucia Azzolina and some other top officials now have police protection.
title: Coronavirus: Italian minister Azzolina targeted with sexist abuse
title_page: Coronavirus: Italian minister Azzolina targeted with sexist abuse - BBC News
maintext: Colleagues sprang to the minister's defence. Five Star Senator Barbara Floridia called on Mr Moles to apologise. His comment comparing credibility to virginity was even more serious, she said, because it had been made "in front of a woman, a minister, who has in recent days suffered every kind of attack and insult" which meant she needed police protection.
